title: Tim & Jenny Ostdiek
description: Jenny and Tim Ostdiek are a Colorado-based folk duo whose heartfelt harmonies and soulful songwriting blend warmth, wit, and authenticity. Together, they weave introspective originals and inspired covers that celebrate connection, storytelling, and the simple beauty of shared song.

title: Grable Howie
description: A local Longmont vivid storyteller and captivating performer. Influenced by the writing styles of NoahKahan and Gregory Alan Isakov, and creating a sound akin to the likes of Mumford & Sons and Judah & The Lion, Howie is redefining the modern folk sound.

title: John Mieras/Ugly Sweater
description: Join us as we ring in the holiday with an Ugly Sweater Party and Live music with John Mieras. Prizes for best sweater!John was always interested in songwriting and patterned his early music after his heroes, Lennon & McCartney. His current favorites and influences include: Gregory Alan Isakov, Josh ...

title: Thomas Dow
description: Come enjoy some Colorado original, soulful, folk and blues music by Thomas! Some tasty covers available as well!

title: Jake Edmoundson
description: Guitars, cadillacs, and hillbilly music from this singer/songwriter based in Lyons, CO
